title: nitrous-oxi.de
description: An open-source OSINT tool featuring an exposed RESTful API and a web-based search panel, designed for research purposes.
modalContent: This project is a comprehensive open-source tool for Open Source Intelligence (OSINT). It includes a REST API built with TypeScript and Fastify, alongside a search panel crafted using NextJS, React, and TailwindCSS. As part of a research initiative, this tool aims to explore the potentials of OSINT while ensuring no user data is stored or retained.

title: yoshi.rest
description: A cutting-edge fitness and lifestyle analytics platform that features a web-based dashboard and social integrations to enhance user experience.

title: roxipr.in
description: A block game software marketplace that offers both free and premium software, serving as an archive for legacy software.

title: pivotpoint.social

title: yoshi.fit
description: An experimental street and gym wear brand offering high-quality garments and supplements at an accessible price point.
